results.name: Number of partitions of n into exactly three positive Fibonacci numbers.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..17711
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1 or
mathematica: h[n_] := h[n] = If[n < 1, 0, If[Function[t, IntegerQ@Sqrt[t + 4] || IntegerQ@Sqrt[t - 4]][5 n^2], n, h[n - 1]]];
a /@ Range[0, 120] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 07 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
